name: Dungeoneer (itch) (tfx, SonderGaming (ulfgar_torunn), Moose, MetricZero, Lou, Xuubasa, zoped)
name_original: Dungeoneer (itch) (tfx, SonderGaming (ulfgar_torunn), Moose, MetricZero, Lou, Xuubasa, zoped)
description:
CONCEPT

NOTE: If you are experiencing severe lighting issues with the web build, please give the windows version a try, it should fix it. 

Thank you for playing!

You are one of the many Mystix Dungeon™ janitors whose sole responsibility in life is to reset the dungeon for the next hero to enter.  

MAINTAIN and KEEP NPC's at bay through items and tasks, UN-PLUNDER coins, RESET traps, AVOID pitfalls and spikes, and lastly don't forget to FINISH before the HERO arrives.  

CONTROLS WASD: Movement
SPACE: Jump
E: Interact   
SHIFT: Run    
SCROLL WHEEL: Swap Utility/Task List
ESCAPE: Pause
MOUSE: Camera Movement CREDITS Evan Denomme - Video TrailerUlfgar - Art and CodingLou Brown - Art and Game Design Salt (tfx) - Music and SoundMetricZero - Code and ImplementationMoose - Code and ImplementationZope - Materials, Lighting and ImplementationXuubasa - Code and ImplementationEvan Denomme - Video Trailer
